name: Moorhuhn (Crazy Chicken)
description: In this hunting game, not everything is about shooting. Crazy Chickens are tricky! Try to find all the secret puzzles to maximize your score!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher. Processor: Any, 1GHz Minimum Clock. Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Open GL Support Required Storage: 25 MB available space Sound Card: Any

reviews.review_text: Strangely enough, there's next to nothing to play here, but I've found it incredibly entertaining, especially speaking about looking for the secrets. I literally can't stop. What a game :)

It's pure classic and nostalgia. For 2 bucks (or 0.49 on sale), you can give a shot! The game really need achievements.  This is the best Moorhuhn on Steam!         YouTubeâ„¢ Video:  But I Love Chickens, Eddy!
Nostalgia.. I recommend playing , killing time )

Nice game from the 'old' times. Cool and funny. Nice remake.  The Game is buggy, really it has many bugs. It is not the old game from the first developer, many things that was working in the old game and was funny doesnt work any more.
